title: Firik salatasi (Turkish freekeh salad)
ingredients: ['150g freekeh', '200ml water', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '3 to 4 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 lemon, juiced and zested', '1 small bunch flat-leaf parsley', 'a few sprigs fresh mint, to taste', '1 bunch spring onions', '1 red, yellow or orange pepper, seeds removed', 'pomegranate seeds (optional)', 'lettuce leaves']
